```{r include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

rand_walk <- function(n, mean = 0, sd = 1) {
    cumsum(rnorm(n, mean, sd))
}

df_a <- data_frame(
    arm = "A",
    x = 1:100,
    y = rand_walk(100)
)

df_b <- data_frame(
    arm = "B",
    x = 1:100,
    y = rand_walk(100)
)

df <- bind_rows(df_a, df_b)
```

```{r eval=TRUE, include=TRUE}
hchart(df, "line", hcaes(x, y, group = arm))
```

# Some code with highlighting

```{r eval=FALSE}
highchart(
    list(
        series = list(
            list(name = "A",
                 data = c(2, 3, 1)), #<<
            list(name = "B",
                 data = c(5, 0, 2))  #<<
        )
    )
)
```
